short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bring back the old Twitter logo on Twitter.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Twitter website used to show the company logo, the Twitter Bird, as an Icon, but it has since been replaced with the "doge" meme (a dog looking confused). Many users prefer the old look - this extension will, after the page loads in with the initial icon (whether it is a doge or other icon in the future), replace that icon with the old Twitter logo. The logo will stay there for the duration of the user's use of the page, until they refresh or come to the page on a new tab.
